title: AFC Quarterback Shakeups, Cutdown Days, Roster Moves, Rookie Risers, Doug Williams Interview, Breakout Players
itunes:title: AFC Quarterback Shakeups, Cutdown Days, Roster Moves, Rookie Risers, Doug Williams Interview, Breakout Players
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, DeAngelo Hall, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt break down how confident the Houston Texans are with quarterback Deshaun Watson and the Miami Dolphins with their young quarterback, Tua Tagovailoa in addition to New York Jets rookie quarterback Zach Wilson. The crew also discusses how practices change and what the feeling is like on cutdown day. Super Bowl XXII MVP Doug Williams joins the show for a live interview with Kay, DeAngelo, Peter and Kyle. The hosts also bring you up to date with the breaking news of the New England Patriots releasing quarterback Cam Newton. On the show, the crew makes their final rookie riser rankings of the preseason and Peter Schrager updates his list of the Top 10 breakout players ahead of the 2021 season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
